overview: A family drama on the dangers of sweeping years of truth under the carpet and hoping for the best. A teenage girl, Engela, visits the Karoo farm of her uncle Frans and aunt Koba during the school holidays. A journey of discovery starts: she has to find out who she really is and where she comes from. Three visitors in  one week change her life forever and her uncleâ€™s obsession with the rugby try by Mannetjies Roux is at last explained.
title: Send Regards to Mannetjies Roux
